title: Meta agrees to update policy on sharing publicly available residential addresses on Facebook and Instagram
content:
While Facebook and Instagram have rules that prevent users from sharing someone’s residential address, an exception in their policy has allowed users to share publicly available residential addresses on both platforms so far. description: In response to an Oversight Board advisory, Meta has announced that it will no longer let users share publicly available residential addresses on Facebook and Instagram.
